main event: A civilian observed a yellow-white object the size of a baseball while walking in their yard in Detroit.
interesting points: The object was one in number and observed during the night., The observation was made while walking in the yard., There were weather balloons launched in the local area., The object's color was described as yellow-white., The conclusion of the report leans towards the object being probably a balloon.
sighted object: one yellow-white object the size of a baseball
